mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.*, rownum r FROM( select t1.id as stockin_id, t1.stockin_code as stockin_code, t1.stockin_type as stockin_type, t1.opposite as stockin_opposite, t1.original_code as stockin_original_code, t1.handled_by as stockin_handled_by, t1.handled_date as stockin_handled_date, t1.prepared_by as stockin_prepared_by, t1.prepared_time as stockin_prepared_time, t1.remark as stockin_remark, t1.handling_status as stockin_handling_status, t1.enabled as stockin_enabled, t2.id as warehouse_id, t2.warehouse_code as warehouse_code, t2.warehouse_name as warehouse_name from wms_stockin t1 left join wms_warehouse t2 on t1.warehouse_code = t2.warehouse_code
t1.id=#{id} and t1.stockin_code=#{stockInCode} and t1.original_code=#{originalCode} and t1.stockin_type=#{stockInType} and t1.warehouse_code=#{warehouseCode} and t1.handled_by=#{handledBy} and (t1.handled_date between #{handledDateBegin} and #{handledDateEnd})
order by t1.prepared_time desc ) A
WHERE rownum<=#{page.endRow} ) WHERE r >= #{page.startRow}
mapper.insert:
select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into wms_stockin (id, stockin_type, opposite,warehouse_code,original_code,handled_by,handled_date,prepared_by,prepared_time,remark,handling_status,enabled) values (#{id},#{stockInType},#{opposite},#{warehouse.warehouseCode},#{originalCode},#{handledBy},#{handledDate},#{preparedBy},#{preparedTime},#{remark},#{handlingStatus},#{enabled})

select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into wms_stockin (id, stockin_type, stockin_code,handling_status,prepared_by,prepared_time,enabled) values (#{id},#{stockInType},#{stockInCode},#{handlingStatus},#{preparedBy},#{preparedTime},#{enabled})

select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into wms_stockin_goods (id, stockin_code, sku_id,quantity,measure_unit,batch_number,remark,indiv_enabled,indiv_finished,wares_status,original_code) values (#{id},#{stockIn.stockInCode},#{skuId},#{quantity},#{measureUnit},#{batchNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{indivEnabled},#{indivFinished, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{waresStatus},#{originalCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
